candidate_1.title: Business-as-usual
candidate_1.description: Maintain current transportation policies with minimal changes to existing infrastructure. Focus on road maintenance and incremental improvements to traffic flow.

candidate_2.title: Slow cars
candidate_2.description: Implement speed reduction measures including 20mph zones, traffic calming features, and speed bumps. Prioritize pedestrian safety while maintaining car access.

candidate_3.title: Few cars
candidate_3.description: Reduce car usage through congestion charges, limited parking, and improved public transport. Encourage cycling and walking with dedicated infrastructure.

candidate_4.title: No cars
candidate_4.description: Create a fully pedestrianized zone around St. Mary's Church. All vehicle access restricted except emergency services. Maximum priority for walking, cycling, and public spaces.
